To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private AroonOscillator _aroon;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_aroon = AROON(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_aroon.IsReady)
{
    var aroonUp = _aroon.AroonUp.Value;
    var aroonDown = _aroon.AroonDown.Value;
    var current = _aroon.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.aroon = self.AROON(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.aroon.IsReady:
    aroon_up = self.aroon.AroonUp.Value
    aroon_down = self.aroon.AroonDown.Value
    current = self.aroon.Current.Value
